meanings.definition: A mechanical device used in climbing to ascend a rope.
meanings.sent1: The jumar helped the climber go up the rope easily.
meanings.sent2: I always bring my jumar when I go rock climbing.
meanings.sent3: The jumar and the rope were best friends, always working together.
meanings.sent4: The jumar was like a little helper pulling the climber up the rope.
meanings.sent5: The shiny jumar gleamed in the sunlight as it ascended the rope.

meanings.definition: To climb using a jumar device.
meanings.sent1: She jumared up the cliff with skill and determination.
meanings.sent2: We will jumar our way to the top of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to jumar up the tree for a better view.
meanings.sent4: He jumared through life's challenges with resilience.
meanings.sent5: Jumaring up the steep slope felt like conquering a mountain.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a type of ascender used in climbing.
meanings.sent1: The jumar was a popular choice among climbers for its reliability.
meanings.sent2: Do you have the new jumar model for our next climb?
meanings.sent3: The jumar was the hero of the climbing expedition, saving the day.
meanings.sent4: She cherished her jumar as a symbol of her passion for climbing.
meanings.sent5: The jumar's name echoed through the mountains as climbers praised its performance.
